summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Thirteenth Avenue South, from Snoqualmie Street to Lucile Street, all in The City of Seattle, by attaching hydrants to the existing watermains in said district; all in accordance with Resolution No. 4372 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
